mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_name, exam_paper_id, score, batch, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from exam_paper_user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_paper_user(user_id, user_name, exam_paper_id, score, batch, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{examPaperId}, #{score}, #{batch}, #{status}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy})

insert into exam_paper_user(user_id, user_name, exam_paper_id, score, batch, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.examPaperId}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.batch}, #{entity.status}, now(), #{entity.createBy}, now(), #{entity.updateBy})

insert into exam_paper_user(user_id, user_name, exam_paper_id, score, batch, status, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.examPaperId}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.batch}, #{entity.status}, now(), #{entity.createBy}, now(), #{entity.updateBy})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id), user_name = values(user_name), exam_paper_id = values(exam_paper_id), score = values(score), batch = values(batch), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), create_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(update_time), update_by = values(update_by)
mapper.update:
update exam_paper_user
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
exam_paper_id = #{examPaperId},
score = #{score},
batch = #{batch},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = now(),
update_by = #{updateBy},
where id = #{id}
